english_translation: The name of Abi al-Rijal is Muhammad ibn Abdul-Rahman al-Ansari, originally from Madinah, narrating from Umarah. His hadiths are rejected/munkar.

potential_issues.issue: This is a biographical and grading note, not a hadith transmission
potential_issues.impact: This identifies Muhammad ibn Abdul-Rahman as munkar al-hadith (rejected in hadith), indicating his hadiths are not reliable
